name: Lemon Poppy Seed Loaf
author: IRENED
summary: This has a nice fresh lemon flavor.  Makes nice muffins, also.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Heavily grease and flour two 9x5 inch loaf pans
Sift together flour, baking soda, and salt
In a large bowl, cream butter or margarine, and sugar until light and fluffy
Beat in eggs, one at a time
Mix lemon juice and yogurt together and add alternately with the sifted flour mixture to the butter mixture
Stir in lemon rind and poppy seeds
Pour mixture into prepared pans and smooth tops
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 50 minutes or until browned and a knife inserted in the center comes out clean
Cool on rack for 15 minutes before turning out of pans
